attributes.additional_details:
Save War Years Remembered Museum
Northern Ireland's most extensive and unique collection of military and home front artifacts which encompasses the entire island of Ireland.

By finding direct sponsership / funding and a permanent home.

It is important that our heritage and history is preserved so that all generations can learn from the the mistakes made in the past to prevent it from happening again in the future. Giving all cultures on this Isle a greater understanding of each others history and culture and how it was and can be shared when we look at the core of each others identies during the two greatest impacts of the 20th centuary i/e World War 1 & 2 leaving a lasting legacy for our future generations.
